summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3416 for the improvement of Pine Street and Stewart Street, each from 1st Avenue to Pike Place; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 42340, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
